code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={projects:[]};const projectsSlice=createSlice({name:'projects',initialState,reducers:{setProjects(state,action){state.projects=action.payload;}}});export const{setProjects}=projectsSlice.actions;export default projectsSlice.reducer;export const fetchProjects=()=>async dispatch=>{const response=await fetch('https://ratheeshcoder.github.io/portfolio/assets/portfolio.json');const data=await response.json();dispatch(setProjects(data));};
